name: CQ.search.Util
doc:
The CQ.search.Util contains utilities for a globally set
Query Builder and lenses.

methods.name: addLens
methods.doc:
Adds a lens to the lens container or - if no container is defined -
sets the solely lens.

methods.name: getLens
methods.doc: Returns the active lens of the lens container or the solely lens.

methods.name: getLensContainer
methods.doc: Returns the lens container or null if no container is set.

methods.name: getSelectedPaths
methods.doc: Returns the paths of the selected items

methods.name: getSelection
methods.doc: Returns the selection of the active lens.

methods.name: loadData
methods.doc:
Passes the given data to the lens container or - if no
containter is defined - to the solely lens.

methods.name: maskLens
methods.doc: Sets the mask on the active lens.
